# Hej

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(reactable)

```

```{r}
#| echo: false

d <- palmerpenguins::penguins %>% 
  drop_na()


```


```{r}
reactable::reactable(d)

```



## Karta Majorna

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(
    lng=11.91605, 
    lat=57.69195, 
    label="Majorna"
  ) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron)
```
